sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CatalogTransactionUpdateProceed</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Invokes when the user hits "save and checkout" from the cart.
Updates the current cart item.
Then checks the user out</description>
        <name>CatalogTransactionUpdateProceed</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");

var CatalogTransactionUpdateProceed = Class.create();

CatalogTransactionUpdateProceed.prototype = {
	
	initialize : function(request, response) {
		this.request = request;
		this.response = response;
	},
	
	execute : function() {
		try {
			var cart;
			var cartName = this.request.getParameter("sysparm_cart_name");
			if (!JSUtil.nil(cartName))
				cart = GlideappCart.get(cartName);
			else
				cart = GlideappCart.get();
			var cart_item = this.request.getParameter('sysparm_cart_id');
			cart.updateCart(this.request, cart_item);
			return new CatalogTransactionCheckout(this.request, this.response).execute();
		} catch (e) {
			var catalogExceptionUtils = new CatalogExceptionUtils();
			if(catalogExceptionUtils.isCartException(e)) {
				return catalogExceptionUtils.handleCartException(e);	
			}
			gs.debug(e);
		}
	}
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2008-09-23 14:02:08</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8f845ecfc0a8002700a68e0914ec881c</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CatalogTransactionUpdateProceed</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">6d218d0f6d2620100acb70b35343303c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8f845ecfc0a8002700a68e0914ec881c</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-01-09 12:44:05</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>863</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
